translations: [组织]嗜碱粒细胞（（basophil 的复数）

sentences.sentence: The functions of basophils, one of the first immune cells to be identified, continue to confound researchers.
sentences.translation: 嗜碱性细胞，第一种被发现的免疫细胞，它的功能继续令研究人员困惑。

sentences.sentence: Basophils are not true phagocytes but contain large amounts of histamine as well as other mediators of inflammation.
sentences.translation: 嗜碱性粒细胞不是真正的巨噬细胞，但也含有大量的组胺和其他炎症介质。

sentences.sentence: The allergic reaction is characterized by activation of two types of inflammatory cells, called mast cells and basophils.
sentences.translation: 过敏反应的特点是由两种类型的炎性细胞，肥大细胞和嗜碱性粒细胞，激活。
